name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-oriented Senior DevOps Engineer with over 10 years of experience in ensuring data quality, consistency, and integrity in distributed systems. Proficient in batch processing, stream processing, and API testing, with a strong ability to develop and implement effective test strategies. Expert in utilizing **Python** (FastAPI, Django, Flask) for building high-quality APIs and automation tools, and well-versed in cloud services like **AWS** and **Azure** for cloud-native architecture. Recognized for systemic thinking and the capability to work independently, successfully contributing to major projects with leading organizations, including VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **Python** and **FastAPI** to engineer backend services for enhancing document automation, user onboarding, and comprehensive reporting workflows, improving efficiency by **30%**.
Implemented **API testing** methodologies to ensure robust functionality and reliability of services, significantly increasing transaction integrity and data consistency.
Architected event-driven solutions with **Celery** and **Redis** for asynchronous processing of financial transaction requests, reducing processing times by **25%**.
Deployed microservices on **Azure App Services** while leveraging **Terraform** for infrastructure as code, maintaining operational excellence in cloud environments and achieving a **99.9%** uptime.
Spearheaded the creation and maintenance of data pipelines using **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions** to facilitate regulatory data exchange, ensuring compliance with data quality standards and timely delivery.
Led security assessments and successfully integrated **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C** to establish secure and scalable authentication systems, improving security posture.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to resolve systemic integration challenges, formulate effective test strategies, and manage release strategies to enhance the overall performance of distributed systems.

• Ensured **data quality** through thorough **API testing** and validation of **transaction integrity** to support robust backend systems in **Python** and **FastAPI**.
• Developed backend systems to facilitate **batch processing** and **stream processing**, automating document workflows and enhancing user onboarding with **Celery** and **Redis**.
• Orchestrated the deployment of microservices using **Azure App Services** and **Terraform**, resulting in a **30%** improvement in deployment speed across environments.
• Engineered data pipelines employing **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions** for secure and efficient data flows, achieving a processing time reduction of **25%** for regulatory data exchanges.
• Conducted extensive security audits to uphold **data consistency** and integrated OAuth2 and **Azure AD B2C** for secure access controls, maintaining compliance with industry standards.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to enhance distributed systems, ensuring successful release management and regulatory compliance in line with **systemic thinking** and **independent work** strategies.

• Ensured **data quality** and **transaction integrity** across backend services for trade execution, portfolio management, and account tracking, using **Python** and **Flask**.
• Engineered **batch processing** and **stream processing** for real-time price feed with **asyncio**, **WebSockets**, and **Redis** to support high-frequency transactions with response times under **50 ms**.
• Collaborated with frontend teams to implement efficient **API testing** through robust **REST APIs** and **WebSocket channels**, ensuring **data consistency** for seamless user interactions.
• Designed systems with a focus on **distributed systems** architecture to comply with regulatory requirements such as **MiFID II** and **GDPR**, while ensuring adherence to internal data security protocols.
• Developed a comprehensive **test strategy** incorporating **PyTest**, **tox**, and mock servers, resulting in a **30% reduction** in QA testing time and streamlining CI processes.
• Optimized backend task execution by introducing job queuing and scheduling solutions with **Celery** and **RabbitMQ**, reducing processing times by up to **20%**.
• Demonstrated **systemic thinking** and **independent work** capabilities to improve backend services and enhance overall trading operations.
